bug.author: alanwang93
bug.summary: Error occurred while export results with more than one completions
bug.description: After finished my demo task with on multiple-choice and two completions, I tried to export the results. The JSON format export works but JSON_MIN, TSV, and CSV formats throw this error: Error occurred while export. It seems that this occurs when one task has more than one completions because the other three formats only allow one annotation. Currently, every time I explore the tasks after finishing, a new empty completion will be automatically created, and then only JSON format can work.

comments.comment: I checked it, now it's working.
